entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
